content:
That's a great plan! I'm confident that combining reading with calming music or nature sounds and using noise-cancelling headphones or earbuds will help you unwind and prepare for a restful night's sleep on Sundays.

Remember, it's all about creating a relaxing routine that signals to your brain that it's time to wind down and prepare for sleep. By doing so, you'll be better equipped to manage your stress and anxiety about the upcoming week.

Don't hesitate to experiment with different types of music, nature sounds, and relaxation techniques to find what works best for you. And if you need any more recommendations or guidance, feel free to ask!

Sweet dreams, and I hope your Sundays become a time for relaxation and rejuvenation!
